name: The Wizard (DINOSAURSSSSSSSS)
description:
The Wizard is a video game by Chris Maire featuring the compositional stylings Paul Dean.

You've arrived at The Wizard's tower to find that there's a note on the door, you just missed him; the Wizard has stepped out. He'll probably be back soon, but the door's open, lights are still on, why not stick your head in and see what he's been conjuring up?

Created for Wizard Jam X : https://www.idlethumbs.net/forums/topic/12755-dev-log-the-wizard/

Controls

WASD - move

Left Click - interact / throw item

Right Click - zoom
